column1: OtherSpeak : Mounths ago, a handful of vile crooks came !
OtherSpeak : Looking for some intel on NOMTRESOR.
OtherSpeak : They stole some of my husbands research
OtherSpeak : Get it for me and I’ll share it with you.
OtherSpeak : It’s the only thing that I have left of him.
Choice : Sorry, I don’t have time for this.
column2: Choice : Heck, why not. I'll see what I can do! (quest)

column1: OtherSpeak : I’m begging you, don’t leave!
Narrator : A group of bandits is resting in the shade of a tree. They don't seem to have noticed CAPITAINE yet.
column5: Narrator : CAPITAINE spots a group of bandits. They’re getting closer.

column1: Narrator : Behind them are stacked what seems to be stolen crates.
column5: Narrator : Behind them are stacked what seems to be stolen crates.

column2: Choice : Hey! You’ll return the stolen goods, this instant! (attack)
OtherSpeak : Ahahah, we seem to have a hero there fellas, how pathetic!

column7: OtherSpeak : Where do you think you’re going?
column8: PlayerSpeak : Leave now, before I change my mind.
OtherSpeak : We better not risk it lads, let’s go...

column1: Narrator : The bandit leader seems to have some diaries and maps in a small purse.
Narrator : Although nothing seems to make any sense for CAPITAINE.
Narrator : Maybe the old lady will manage to make sense of it.
OtherSpeak : Did you get my husbands work !?
OtherSpeak : Then don’t expect I’ll tell you anything about NOMTRESOR !!!

column2: OtherSpeak : You’re incredible! Thank you from the bottom of my heart!
column3: OtherSpeak : You think this is funny? You don’t have anything to show

column2: OtherSpeak : Sadly, even after a life’s work, my husband only figured one thing about NOMTRESOR.
OtherSpeak : One word, came up in all of his research
OtherSpeak : I hope it’s enough for you to carry on the search for NOMTRESOR
